titles: The description and use of the nocturnal by M. Samuel Foster ... ; with the addition of a ruler, shewing the measures of inches and other parts of most countries, compared with our English ones ; being useful for all merchants & tradesmen.
author: Foster, Samuel, d. 1652.
R., Mr.
notes: Includes: "Additions to the instrument, in brass; made by Mr. R. Aug. 1st. 1684."
Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library. Cambridge University.
keywords: Scientific apparatus and instruments --  Early works to 1800.
